title: Dragon Arms by David Hutchison (Antarctic Press)
description:
Millennia ago, the Dragon Kings held the world in their iron grip, until the most powerful warriors of the age waged a final battle against these monsters and freed humanity. 
Now, a new breed of warrior must destroy the corrupt heroes of old; heroes who have become as hideous and maniacal as the monsters they once overthrew. 
To defeat these tyrants, five legendary heroes have been assembled by the ancient wizard Anrack. He has instructed them in the use of the powerful, ageless weapons known as the Dragon Arms. But even these new champions and their magical armaments may not be enough to topple the indestructible might of these timeless masters of death!

Written by David Hutchison and published by Antarctic Press. After two six-issues series were published the title was put on permanent hiatus
